Text: the most people never check for the hotfixes. They download the release and they never check again. but I check! and you upload them because you are an awesome human being. Thank you a lot for your time to make it playable for us, the puny mortals :-)

Well, if there is game breaking hotfix, like this one then why not upload it :D

If that could be only "added sign, and reduced amount of yellow spiders" fix i think i could skip it. BUT if it repair critical things like crashes or lost savedata then i suppose it's my duty :D
Works like a charm. Thanks for the updated game. A pity it doesn't have coop mode.
when are you uploading March 26 2013 - Doorway to Adventure with the hotfix, it has some very sweet changes, especially the lighting rod that i need so much.
